name: OptionGroup_toStringTest
description: Unit tests for the toString method of the OptionGroup class.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithShortOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup with short options.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithLongOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup with long options.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithMixedOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup with mixed options (short and long).

test_cases.name: testToStringWithNoDescription
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup with options having no description.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithEmptyGroup
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of OptionGroup with an empty group.
